name: Romantic Chateau in the Charente Maritime
description:
DESCRIPTION
Once upon a time, there was a magical place in Charente-Maritime close to the ocean, located between Bordeaux, Cognac, La Rochelle and Angoulême.
Its park overlooking the rolling countryside and vineyards, allows you to receive your guests in a natural, spacious and charming setting.
The château itself offers a natural setting of pure romance and elegance, a complete change of scenery from the reality of "La vie de Château", with high quality comfort and an authentic dimension to your event.
To make your reception as intimate and personal as possible, we guarantee you the exclusivity of the premises by entrusting you with the keys to this idyllic fortress.
You can celebrate in complete conviviality without any time limit. Your guests can also be accommodated on site if required and enjoy this wonderful place.
The Château has extensive accommodation for 67 people, authentic yet modern decor, beautiful and spacious grounds and a variety of event venues, all in the heart of the countryside.
The exclusivity of the premises includes 9 rooms, each of which sleeps 25 people and invites you to travel to an unique atmosphere. Every detail will transport and surprise you.
We also offer your guests other rooms as well as 3 dormitories with 10 beds each, allowing them to enjoy the premises in complete privacy before and after the event.
We offer several places according to the number of guests, each one will charm you and surprise all your guests.
The castle's dining room, ideal for intimate and prestigious events, with the main entrance and its imposing piano, the small lounge and the large lounge for cocktails.
The billiard room for an evening with friends, but also ideal for the photo shoot of the groom's preparation around a selection of Cognac from the region.
The Grand Chai, building dating from the 18th century, restored to its original splendour.
This room can accommodate up to 250 people, you will find a dance floor with a DJ area and a mobile bar, a fully equipped kitchen office much appreciated by caterers, cloakrooms and toilets.
You could also, weather permitting, organise your dinner outdoors on the lawn in front of the château, for the lighting, don't worry, we'll take care of it.
The outside lean-to overlooking the pool and the park is the ideal place for your cocktail parties or garden parties.
The undergrowth, surrounded by the Japanese garden and the bamboo grove, is an idyllic place for this emotional moment.
And for the children, an outdoor play area is dedicated to them. Think of the baby-sitting service so that all the adults can enjoy the moment and that everyone leaves with unforgettable memories.
To finish this beautiful story ends full of zenitude, plan a little relaxation and wellness and for that we have the heated swimming pool and our SPA corner with jacuzzi, sauna and massages (on reservation only).
If this castle is your dream event venue, book it as soon as possible as we welcome many weddings throughout the year.
We will assist you in the preparation of your reception. You will receive information on the service providers recommended by the Château de Puyrigaud. You can choose the "Turnkey" option and save yourself the stress of the organisation.
A team of professionals will give you a warm welcome and work to make your dream come true.
